comments: The binomial transform of A025250(n+1) is A025273(n+2). - _Paul Barry_, May 11 2005
mathematica: nmax = 30; aa = ConstantArray[0,nmax]; aa[[1]] = 1; aa[[2]] = 0; aa[[3]] = 1; aa[[4]] = 1; Do[aa[[n]] = Sum[aa[[k]]*aa[[n-k]],{k,1,n-1}],{n,5,nmax}]; aa (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 25 2015 *)CoefficientList[Series[(1-Sqrt[1-4*x+4*x^2-4*x^3+4*x^4])/(2*x), {x, 0, 20}], x] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Feb 01 2015 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
